paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information specifically for the KCNH2 gene, including penetrance data.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: SCD is the first event in 5% of asymptomatic LQTS individuals.
Individuals and family members at risk with a normal ECG may be identified through genetic testing.

functional_data.summary: Functional assays indicate altered ion channel activity.

variants.additional_notes: Variants in KCNH2 are significant contributors to LQTS.
key_quotes: 70%–75% of LQT cases are attributable to pathogenic variations only in 3 genes, KCNQ1 (LQT1), KCNH2 (LQT2), and SCN5A (LQT3).
Currently, nearly 1200 pathogenic variations have been identified in 15 genes.

extraction_metadata.notes: Data was extracted thoroughly from the main text.
